name: Fire Control Brigade (FCB)
description:
You are the Fire Control Brigade (FCB) and you need to save the world.

HOW TO PLAY
Select a building type you can afford from the toolbar and click on a building in the city to replace it with this type. You cannot replace a building that is on fire.

Fire Stations needs access to a  nearby Tank with a least some water, which is provided by placing Pumps near it.
